query.description:
Text search can be performed on the following fields:
- memberships.first_name
- memberships.last_name
- cards.id
- cards.nickname
- cards.last_digits
- cards.status
- cards.pre_expires_at
- cards.exp_year
- cards.exp_month
Returned page (cf. [Pagination](/get-started/general/pagination)).
Number of cards per page (cf. [Pagination](/get-started/general/pagination)).

Cards can be sorted by a specific property and order.
üëâ Property: `status`, `nickname`, `last_activity_at` or `created_at`
üëâ Order: `asc` (Ascending) / `desc` (Descending)
Cards can be filtered by their `holder_id`.
Cards can be filtered by their `holder_id`.
Cards can be filtered by their `status`.
Cards can be filtered by their `status`.
Cards can be filtered by their `bank_account_id`.
Cards can be filtered by their `bank_account_id`.
Cards can be filtered by their `card_level`.
Cards can be filtered by their `card_level`.
Cards can be filtered by their `id`.
Cards can be filtered by their `id`.

request.description:
OAuth scope: `card.read`

Retrieves the list of cards that can be viewed by the authenticated membership.

You can filter and sort this list by using [query parameters](#Query-Parameters) üëá

<Info>
  This endpoint is still in **beta**. Please get in touch with our team if you have any question or feedback: [here](https://getqonto.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portals).
</Info>

request.description:
OAuth scope: `card.read`

Retrieves the URL to be displayed in an iframe to preview the card, identified by the `id` path parameter, with its details.

Note that HTML encoding is applied to the URL, replacing `&`, `<`, and `>` with `\u0026`, `\u003c`, and `\u003e` respectively.

We recommend the following size for the iframe:
* Height - 460px
* Width - 504px

This size will ensure an optimum UX within the iframe for both the card view and [Stong Customer Authentication](../docs/Strong-Customer-Authentication.md) experience.

<Info>
  This endpoint is still in **beta**. Please get in touch with our team if you have any question or feedback: [here](https://getqonto.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portals).
</Info>

response.name: Returns the iframe url of the card idendified by the `id` path parameter.

item.name: Report a physical card as lost

header.description: Required only for Sandbox API requests; to get one, please sign up to the [Developer Portal](https://developers.qonto.com/).

request.description:
OAuth scope: `card.write`

Reports the physical card identified by the `id` path parameter as **lost**, permanently blocking its usage.

<Info>
  This endpoint is still in **beta**. Please get in touch with our team if you have any question or feedback: [here](https://getqonto.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portals).
</Info>

response.name: Returns the card reported as lost.

request.description:
OAuth scope: `card.write`

---

Updates the nickname of the card identified by the `id` path parameter.

Only admins and owners of an organization have the permissions to update a card's nickname.

> This endpoint is still in **beta**. Please get in touch with our team if you have any question or feedback: [here](https://getqonto.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portals).
